statements: SELECT * FROM fitness_plans;
SELECT patient_id, activity_level FROM fitness_plans WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_plans FROM fitness_plans;
SELECT * FROM fitness_plans WHERE activity_level IN ('Low', 'Medium');
SELECT patient_id, plan_description FROM fitness_plans ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_plans WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, activity_level FROM fitness_plans WHERE activity_level = 'High' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, plan_description FROM fitness_plans WHERE plan_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_plans FROM fitness_plans GROUP BY activity_level;
SELECT patient_id, activity_level, plan_description FROM fitness_plans WHERE activity_level = 'Medium' AND patient_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientFitnessPlan WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, activity_level FROM PatientFitnessPlan ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ActivityRecord WHERE steps_count > 10000;
SELECT plan_name, target_calories_per_day FROM PatientFitnessPlan WHERE activity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM ActivityRecord WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT plan_name, activity_level, target_calories_per_day FROM PatientFitnessPlan WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT activity_level, plan_name, target_calories_per_day FROM PatientFitnessPlan WHERE target_calories_per_day > 2000;
SELECT * FROM ActivityRecord WHERE steps_count > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(steps_count) AS max_steps, MIN(steps_count) AS min_steps FROM ActivityRecord;
SELECT plan_name, AVG(target_calories_per_day) AS avg_calories FROM PatientFitnessPlan GROUP BY plan_name;
SELECT * FROM patient;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM wearable_device WHERE activity_level = 'active';
SELECT device_name, heart_rate FROM wearable_device WHERE steps_count > 10000;
SELECT plan_description, calories_goal FROM fitness_plan WHERE duration_days >= 30 ORDER BY calories_goal DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT device_name, heart_rate FROM wearable_device WHERE steps_count > 5000 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT plan_description, calories_goal, duration_days FROM fitness_plan WHERE calories_goal >= 2000 AND duration_days <= 30;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient JOIN fitness_plan ON patient.patient_id = fitness_plan.patient_id WHERE plan_description LIKE 'Weight Loss%';

SELECT p.name, f.calories_goal, w.activity_level FROM patient p JOIN fitness_plan f ON p.patient_id = f.patient_id JOIN wearable_device w ON p.patient_id = w.patient_id WHERE f.calories_goal > 1500 AND w.activity_level = 'High' ORDER BY p.name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM wearable_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM fitness_plan WHERE end_date > DATE '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_date, steps_count, calories_burned FROM activity_data WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE weight >= 60;
SELECT activity_date, steps_count FROM activity_data WHERE calories_burned > 200;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM fitness_plan WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM wearable_devices WHERE patient_id = 'e70b3a5b-7b02-4dbf-bdd1-912c79982bcb';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM fitness_plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT device_type, steps, calories_burned FROM wearable_devices INNER JOIN activity_levels ON wearable_devices.device_id = activity_levels.device_id;
SELECT progress_date, progress_percentage FROM plan_progress WHERE plan_id = 2 ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE weight < 70;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM activity_levels WHERE steps > 10000 ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM fitness_plans WHERE patient_id = 3;
